objects.description: A BMD value was successfully calculated.
objects.name: BMD

objects.description: A BMDL value was successfully calculated.
objects.name: BMDL

objects.description: A BMDU value was successfully calculated.
objects.name: BMDU

objects.description: An AIC value was successfully calculated.
objects.name: AIC

objects.description: The correct variance model was used (based on p-test #2).
objects.name: Variance Type

objects.description: The variance model appropriately captures the variance of the dataset being modeled (based on p-test #3).
objects.name: Variance Fit

objects.description: The mean model is appropriately modeling the dataset, based on the global-goodness-of-fit (p-test #4).
objects.name: GGOF

objects.description: The mean model is appropriately modeling the dataset, based on the global-goodness-of-fit (p-test #4).
objects.name: GGOF (Cancer)

objects.description: The ratio between the BMD and BMDL values is large, indicating a large spread of estimates in the range of interest (warning).
objects.name: BMD/BMDL (serious)

objects.description: The ratio between the BMD and BMDL values is large, indicating a large spread of estimates in the range of interest (caution).
objects.name: BMD/BMDL (warning)

objects.description: The absolute value of the residual at the dose closest to the BMD is large, which means the model may not be estimating well in this range.
objects.name: Residual of Interest

objects.description: The model output file included additional warnings.
objects.name: Warnings

objects.description: The BMD estimate is higher than the maximum dose modeled, thus the model is extrapolating a result.
objects.name: BMD higher

objects.description: The BMDL estimate is higher than the maximum dose modeled, thus the model is extrapolating a result.
objects.name: BMDL higher

objects.description: The BMD estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose (caution).
objects.name: Low BMD (warning)

objects.description: The BMDL estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose (caution).
objects.name: Low BMDL (warning)

objects.description: The BMD estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose (warning).
objects.name: Low BMD (serious)

objects.description: The BMDL estimate is lower than the lowest non-zero dose (warning).
objects.name: Low BMDL (serious)

objects.description: The absolute value of the residual at the control is large, which is often used to estimate the BMR. Thus, the BMR estimate may be inaccurate.
objects.name: Control residual

objects.description: The standard deviation estimate at the control is different the the reported deviation, which is often used to estimate the BMR. Thus, the BMR estimate may be inaccurate.
objects.name: Control stdev
